front.title: Information as a bird with wings that flies and hits the user device screen as Icons

abstract.t: The document proposes a WWW as an intelligent being that delivers information to users. This can be combined with a Single SignON solution for the WWW seen as one Giant computer. Imagine having a handy device and you travel to Bangkok and in the morning when you authenticate to WWW, your WWW navigation screen shows you very useful Icons that can create a better experience for you.
